text: What do you do at your occupation?
name: occupation
flavor: Condense the verb in your answer into a single -er noun. (e.g. if you are a sheep farmer, your answer will be "farmer")

text: What was your first pet's specific species/breed? If you never had a pet, please answer with an animal you wish you owned.
name: firstPet

text: Whatâ€™s your most embarrassing childhood memory? Be specific.
name: childhoodMemory
flavor: Condense this story into two words

text: What is the object you'd least like to be stabbed by?
name: badStab

text: What is something you are good at? (Verb ending in -ing)
name: proficientVerb

text: How many carrots do you believe you could eat in one sitting, if someone, like, forced you to eat as many carrots as possible?
name: forcedCarrotCount

text: What is your greatest intangible fear? (e.g. death, loneliness, fear itself)
name: intangibleFear

text: What is your greatest tangible fear? (e.g. horses)
name: tangibleFear

text: What is the last thing you did before starting this worksheet?
name: recentActivity

text: What condition is your body currently in? (single word answer)
name: bodyCondition

text: A word your name kind of sounds like? (e.g. Brian -> Brain)
name: namePseudophone

text: If you had to define your personality in one word, what would it be?
name: personalityWord
